DOC.brief_title: Comparing Different Methods Patient Education Preeclampsia
DOC.detailed_description: This three-arm prospective randomize control trial evaluate patient knowledge preeclampsia different form education . In first arm participant give graphic card depict sign symptom preeclampsia ; permit keep card . In second arm participant show educational video preeclampsia . In third arm participant visual form patient education ; expose counsel receive routine prenatal care . Participants primiparous patient recruit prenatal clinic 18-24 week gestation . At time consent , baseline anxiety assessment STAI-6 questionnaire obtain follow short demographic survey . Participants give short survey preeclampsia knowledge . They randomize either preeclampsia education educational video , graphic card visual educational intervention . The participant randomize computer-generated randomization schema ( 1:1:1 ) . Those randomized card give minute review card . Those randomized educational video watch video run two minute 45 second . For randomized intervention , initial interview . For first two arm receive graphic card watch video , STAI 6 assessment re-administered immediately educational intervention interview . Medical record number every participant collect chart review demographic , preeclampsia risk factor , pregnancy follow ( include triage call visit ) delivery outcomes . The participant approach 32w0d-36w6d gestation complete follow preeclampsia knowledge survey assess retention knowledge . This follow-up survey collect via phone interview . Participants control arm receiving routine prenatal care also complete follow knowledge survey control .
